tactica.title: Tactica
tactica.text: Mobile turn-based strategy game with procedurally generated maps, 3D models and challenging AI. Custom 3D model pipeline from Blender to OpenGL ES as game was released before any mobile 3D engines became available. Multiplayer-Server built in python.

ibeat.title: iBeat the Metronome
ibeat.text: Metronome app with variable sounds and metres. 900'000 downloads total.

isogon.title: ISOGON Fenster Konfigurator
isogon.text: AR app before AR became a thing. ISOGON is a Berlin based window-glass manufacturer, the app allows previewing of structured glasses in 3D.
isogon.tech: OpenGL ES, UIKit, a lot of custom C++ code utilizing PVRTools by Imagination Technologies

iceyetest.title: IC the Eyetest
iceyetest.text: Collaboration with a Berlin-based ophthalmologist, Mobile eye test for iPhone&iPad. Several weeks in the #10 best-selling medical apps after release. Featured on TV.

nickjr.title: Nick Jr. Watch & Learn
nickjr.text: iPhone & iPad App for VIMN Germany, won a Bronze Lovie Award 2014 - Mobile Handheld: Education & Reference

mtvutt.title: MTV Under The Thumb
mtvutt.text: iPhone & iPad App for VIMN Germany, maintenance of the iOS client after original team was aquired by third party.

formicarium.title: Formicarium
formicarium.text: Ecosystem simulation and ants strategy game inspired by Dwarf Fortress. Core ecosystem simulation running in C++ with a decoupled UI using SpriteKit

playplex.title: Viacom Play Plex
playplex.text: White-Label media streaming for MTV, TVLand, BET and Comedy Central outside of the US.

nickelodeon.title: Nickelodeon International App
nickelodeon.text: International version of the iOS Nickelodeon App.

looceyetest.title: LooC Mobile Eye Test
looceyetest.text: Complete rewrite of the eyetest app in Swift. New Color Vision Test added.
looceyetest.tech: UIKit, Swift, lot's of CoreGraphics and a Swift implementation of KDTree's for the color vision test

universeAR.title: Universe AR
universeAR.text: AR visualization of the Solar system and star constellations. Holiday project that ended up becoming the LooC AR Try-On app

loocar.title: LooC AR Try-On
loocar.text: Virtual Try-On of glasses in AR.

looccms.title: LooC Content Management System
looccms.text: Cloud-based management of the 3D models for LooC. Frontend management site for opticians and managers with a serverless backend based on AWS.
looccms.tech: React.js, Node.js, AWS Lambda, Dynamodb, Cloudfront, Blender

grafixandroid.title: Grafix 4.0 Android
grafixandroid.text: Virtual Try-On of glasses in AR on Android.

loocwebgl.title: LooC WebGL Try-On
loocwebgl.text: Virtual Try-On of glasses in the browser.

reframd.title: Reframd iOS App
reframd.text: Virtual Try-On of glasses in AR. Measuring of faces allowing Reframd to create customized frames.

eo.title: Edel-Optics iOS App
eo.text: Measuring of faces and centration of lenses. Allowing Edel-Optics GmbH to customize orders on their web shop.

riddler.title: The Riddler
riddler.text: Interactive Multi-Media AR-Installation for CSAIL MIT. Permanent digital world running on a wall installation, users can interact using their phones in AR.

recast.title: Recast Chrome Extension & Player SSR page
recast.text: Helping my friends of letsrecast.ai with a chrome extension frontend in Solid.js as well as a server-side rendered Solid.js dynamic page for individual recasts.

uhere.title: URHERE Art Performance Streaming Site
uhere.text: Media streaming website for art performances and audio walks in New York. With user management, stripe integration for payment and dynamic content loading
uhere.tech: Solid.js frontend, AWS backend, Stripe payment integration
